detected_errors.description: More than 50% of the rooms/spaces shown in the 2D plan (e.g., central hall, WC, utility room configuration, pantry/breakfast/alcove/window-seat elements) are not represented in the 3D model, indicating major omission rather than a faithful layout transformation.

summary: Although the second image is a genuine 3D cutaway, it omits a majority of the 2D plan’s rooms/spaces and therefore is not a geometrically faithful 2D-to-3D conversion.
